result.eng: It's hard for children when their parents separate.
result.ga: Bíonn sé dian ar na páistí nuair a scarann a dtuismitheoirí óna chéile
result.orig: Bíonn sé dian ar na páistí nuair a scarann a dtuismitheoirí óna chéile
result.html: Bíonn sé dian ar na páistí nuair a scarann a dtuismitheoirí óna chéileIt's hard for children when their parents separate.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn sé dian ar na páistí nuair a scarann a dtuismiṫeoirí óna ċéileIt's hard for children when their parents separate.

result.eng: You'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.
result.ga: Cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oíche
result.orig: Cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oíche
result.html: Cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oícheYou'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.
result.ponchtml: Ċeapfá óna gcuid cainte go raiḃ siad ag bualaḋ craicinn gaċ oíċeYou'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.

result.eng: She had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.
result.ga: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sin
result.orig: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sin
result.html: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sinShe had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.
result.ponchtml: Ċuala sí an scéal óna máṫair a ḃí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sinShe had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.

result.eng: I work from nine o'clock until one o'clock in the bookshop.
result.ga: Oibrím óna naoi a chlog go dtí a haon a chlog sa siopa leabhar
result.orig: Oibrím óna naoi a chlog go dtí a haon a chlog sa siopa leabhar
result.html: Oibrím óna naoi a chlog go dtí a haon a chlog sa siopa leabharI work from nine o'clock until one o'clock in the bookshop.
result.ponchtml: Oibrím óna naoi a ċlog go dtí a haon a ċlog sa siopa leaḃarI work from nine o'clock until one o'clock in the bookshop.

result.eng: I [usually] work from nine o'clock to five.
result.ga: Bím ag obair óna naoi a chlog go dtí a cúig
result.orig: Bím ag obair óna naoi a chlog go dtí a cúig
result.html: Bím ag obair óna naoi a chlog go dtí a cúigI [usually] work from nine o'clock to five.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag obair óna naoi a ċlog go dtí a cúigI [usually] work from nine o'clock to five.

result.eng: I work from nine o'clock to one o'clock.
result.ga: Oibrím óna naoi a chlog go dtí a haon a chlog

result.eng: It was obvious from her face that she had been crying.
result.ga: Bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadh
result.orig: Bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadh
result.html: Bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadhIt was obvious from her face that she had been crying.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé soiléir óna dreaċ go raiḃ sí tar éis a ḃeiṫ ag caoineaḋIt was obvious from her face that she had been crying.
